title: Did Disney’s ‘Mulan’ Experiment Work? A Binge Mode Investigation
description:
Amanda and Sean are joined by Binge Mode's Jason Concepcion and Mallory Rubin to explore the 1998 Disney classic 'Mulan' and the new live-action remake. They talk about what worked, what didn't, and what was removed from the original that marred this reimagining.

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guests: Jason Concepcion and Mallory Rubin
